colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES SHING SHES PAR BRJOD NAS ME TOG GI CHAR 'BEB PAR BYA'O, ,DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI MCHED 'GROGS AEM CHE BKA' BCU PA DANG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS GZHAN LA PHAN BSAM GYIS SOGS YUL 'DI KAR ME LTA MCHOD CING GA-YANG BLANG BA'I BKRA SHIS 'BYUNG 'DUG KYANG LHA BSKYED PA MCHOD PA'I BYIN RLABS SOGS MED PA'I YIG TSIG LTAG CHANG CAN GYI LUGS 'DZIN PA 'GA' SNANG NGO, ,RANG DE LA LTA BSKYED PA'I ME MCHOD ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL RO MCHOG PAR SBYIN SREG GI THAB BSKYED LA, BLO DPON PADMA'I MDZAD PA'I GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED KYI TSIG 'GA' ZHIG BSDUS NAS, RAB BYANGS NGAG DBANG BSOD RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I STENG DU, ,NYER SPYOD LNGA SPEL TSIG DANG BCAS LUG GI BRANG DANG MAR KHU DANG CHANG MCHOD 'BUL SOGS NI, NOM CHE KO'U SHRI CHOS RJE BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS PA'O, ,'DI LTAR BGYIS PA'I NONGS PA CI MCHIS NA, BLA MA LHA LA BSHAGS SHING BZOD PAR GSOL, ,LEGS SHA CUNG ZAD MCHIS PAS GANG THOB DGES, ,'GRO BA RNAMS NAS PHAN PA'I RGYUR 'GYUR CIG , ,,BRKA SHIS, ,)
